official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide for congressional review of capital investments proposed by the Postal Service, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the United States Postal Service, before undertaking any capital investment project costing more than $5,000,000, to submit a report on such project to the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Governmental Affairs of the Senate, and to consider the committees' recommendations.
